channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenText™ -- ZENworks Configuration Management (ZCM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenText™ -- ZENworks Configuration Management (ZCM)

item.title: CVE-2023-6400|2024-08-15T19:47:34.090Z -- opentext%E2%84%A2 -- zenworks%20configuration%20management%20%28zcm%29
item.description: Incorrect Authorization vulnerability in OpenText™ ZENworks Configuration Management (ZCM) allows Unauthorized Use of Device Resources.This issue affects ZENworks Configuration Management (ZCM) versions: 2020 update 3, 23.3, and 23.4.
